sense.name: particles or fragments removed by rubbing, smoothing
sense.examples: The detective sifted through the small mound of iron filings. Sharpening knives will remove small metal filings from the edges of the blades.

sense.name: the public submission of a legal record
sense.examples: There are several filings already at the court house about the noise level from the airport. The attorneys helped her put together a divorce filing.

sense.name: the physical act of smoothing a surface
sense.examples: There was a heap of metal fragments left from the filing. Filing one's nails in a restaurant is not considered proper decorum.

sense.name: the methodical arrangement and maintenance of documents
sense.examples: Can you put these tax papers in the filing cabinet? This job entails a lot of typing and filing. Sally is not happy with her present filing system.
